item.minecraft.splash_potion.effect.fore: Splash Potion of the Forest Dasher
item.minecraft.lingering_potion.effect.f: Lingering Potion of the Forest Dasher
advancements.husbandry.ride_giraffe_with: Use a Map while riding a Giraffe
Feed a Melon to a Hippo
advancements.husbandry.feed_bear_honeyco: Feed a Honeycomb to a Bear
naturalist.midnightconfig.disableFirefly: §8§o[?]§7§o If set to 'Yes', Fireflies will no longer give off particles.
naturalist.midnightconfig.mobRemoval: §c§l§n[!]§7§o Setting these to 'No' will remove any existing mobs of that type in your world, as well as prevent them from spawning §c§l§nentirely.§7§o It works similarly to hostile mobs despawning in Peaceful mode.
naturalist.midnightconfig.biomeConfig: §c§l§n[!]§7§o If you want to change the biomes mobs are in, you must do so with a §c§l§nDATA PACK.§7§o Their files are located under §9§o'naturalist:tags/worldgen/biome/has_<animal>.json'
naturalist.midnightconfig.blacklistConfi: §7§oTo §c§l§nREMOVE§7§o mobs from spawning in certain biomes, add biomes to §9§o'naturalist:tags/worldgen/biome/blacklist/<animal>_blacklist.json'
naturalist.midnightconfig.alligatorRemov: §8§o[?]§7§o If set to 'Yes', Alligators will not spawn, and existing Alligators will be removed.
naturalist.midnightconfig.alligatorSpawn: §8§o[?]§7§o The chance of Alligators spawning in the world.
§8§o[?]§7§o The minimum number of Alligators that can spawn in a group.
§8§o[?]§7§o The maximum number of Alligators that can spawn in a group.
